description: {"blocks":[{"key":"brsnc","text":"This protocol describes a method for the isolation of pan-lymphocytes, pan-myeloid cells, and progenitors from human lymph node tissue. By providing defined media formulations, volumes at each step, and a defined dilution factor for density centrifugation, it yields consistent single-cell suspensions across samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: Lymph node,CD45,Lymphocytes,Myeloid,Isolation,Density gradient,Ficoll,Immune,10x,scRNAseq,Flow cytometry,Leukocyte,Single cell suspension,T cell

{"blocks":[{"key":"avbn6","text":"Add up to 2 ± 10% grams of cleaned lymph node tissue to per   centrifuge tube – record the total weight below.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":60,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"caeho","text":"__________g","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bbqc7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bk4s1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"5A3F9DB0E9F511EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"b2b2i","text":"NOTE: Going beyond the 2 grams of tissue per tube reduces the efficacy of the enzymatic digest and lowers yields.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

Just the base media formulation) to each tube and use a scissors to chop the tissue into a fine “mash”.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2ht18","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"6A3F6150E9F511EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

Just the base media formulation) and spike in   of Collagenase D, and   of DNAse to the tube to begin the enzymatic digestion. Place on a shaker or rotator for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":92,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":116,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":206,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":211,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9845c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"35","error":false,"guid":"6FF6B2B0E9F511EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"0.400","error":false,"guid":"723D4750E9F511EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"0.400","error":false,"guid":"758C4B40E9F511EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"78D7A5B0E9F511EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"4":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"7F134240E9F511EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2libu","text":"After digestion, add   of EDTA     to the digested cell suspensions and incubate for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":31,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":33,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":85,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":90,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"99vuc","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":5,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6v9n7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"0.500","error":false,"guid":"8B1C7750E9F511EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"0.5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"8D3963E0E9F511EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":21}},"2":{"type":"ph","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"8FF04680E9F511EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"number":"8.0"}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"95CA3B10E9F511EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"4":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"97E097F0E9F511EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"20","unit":10}},"5":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"EEA199E3344D11EEAFD10A58A9FEAC02","height":244,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/fybjbixhp.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/fybhbixhp.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fybibixhp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/fybgbixhp.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4lrgs","text":"Distribute and filter the mash of tissue over   cell strainers above   tubes (about 4 filters/2 grams of tissue).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a2hg","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2ce0m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8196u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6drpr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"E68DBCC0E9F511EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"D7179B80E9F511EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"1as3e","text":"NOTE: Cell yields and ease of pushing through the filter are increased by using multiple filters/gram of tissue, default to using more filters to decrease processing time, and increase yields.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6u4ar","text":"Apply pressure with the black rubber bottom or the plastic end of a   syringe plunger to any remaining, partially digested tissue on the cell strainers, and intermittently wash through with DPBS-FBS-EDTA Solution from a transfer pipet – the aim is to push and wash through the tissue until only light pink/white/grey connective tissue remains. When finished, combine the tubes of cell suspension and proceed to the next section.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":68,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9ka0h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"EF2C9DB0E9F511EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cjusb","text":"Centrifuge the cell suspensions for   at   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":41,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"74jch","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"AEDDA500E9F611EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"400","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B2676800E9F611EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"BACFF6B0E9F611EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"20","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dc50r","text":"Remove the supernatants and combine the cell pellets down to a single   tube, top to   with   IMDM-FBS-PSQ Media, spike in   of EDTA    .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":70,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":85,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":92,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":123,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":133,"length":1},{"key":5,"offset":135,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e5k9p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"BD75E960E9F611EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"BF430840E9F611EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C26074E0E9F611EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"20","unit":32}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"0.500","error":false,"guid":"C5DA3250E9F611EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"4":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"0.5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"C7D713C0E9F611EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":21}},"5":{"type":"ph","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"CC7B9590E9F611EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"number":"8.0"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a5h3d","text":"Filter the cell suspension through a   cell strainer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"717c8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"D2EBAFA0E9F611EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2eeo1","text":"In two   tubes, layer   of cell suspension on top of   of Ficoll-Paque Media PLUS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":22,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":53,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9fq30","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"DB1E1320E9F611EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"25","error":false,"guid":"DCF459C0E9F611EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"guid":"DED54EC0E9F611EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8p2kh","text":"Spin for  ,   at   with 4 acceleration and 0 brake, evenly distribute the tubes across the entire rotor to prevent wobbling (use all four buckets if possible as opposed to just two).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":12,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"er12f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"E1EAA510E9F611EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"1200","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E6145190E9F611EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E82975F0E9F611EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"20","unit":10}}}}

Add cold DPBS-FBS-EDTA Solution to a final volume of   and centrifuge the cell suspension for   at  ,  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":91,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":152,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":193,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":198,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":201,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3cdgo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"F02FE770E9F611EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"F366F690E9F611EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"F666A200E9F611EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"400","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"FA204EA0E9F611EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"4":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"FFBB3E60E9F611EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b0uqa","text":"Remove the supernatant and re-suspend the cell pellet in   cold DPBS-FBS-EDTA Solution and centrifuge the cell suspension for   at  ,  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":57,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":126,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":131,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":134,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"31sar","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"085BF410E9F711EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"0B756910E9F711EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"120","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"0E99DA90E9F711EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"11AB8760E9F711EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aode4","text":"Remove the supernatant and re-suspend the cell pellet in cold   IMDM-FBS-PSQ Media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":62,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a3s17","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"1A0A03F0E9F711EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2vvtq","text":"Count cells, and viability by using the NC-3000 cell counter. Calculate total viable cells and record below:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bf3so","text":"cell number: ________cells/mL, ________% viable","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d9rat","text":"final volume: ________mL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"869op","text":"𝑐𝑒𝑙𝑙 𝑛𝑢𝑚𝑏𝑒𝑟 (𝑐𝑒𝑙𝑙𝑠/𝑚𝐿) ∗ 𝑣𝑖𝑎𝑏𝑖𝑙𝑖𝑡𝑦(%) ∗ 𝑓𝑖𝑛𝑎𝑙 𝑣𝑜𝑙𝑢𝑚𝑒(𝑚𝐿) = 𝑡𝑜𝑡𝑎𝑙 𝑣𝑖𝑎𝑏𝑙𝑒 𝑐𝑒𝑙𝑙𝑠","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4d7d2","text":"Total Viable Cells: ________","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4h24r","text":"(Optional QC) Aliquot 2 x 106 cells to a   Falcon tube and place on ice for subsequent flow cytometric analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":1,"length":11},{"style":"sup","offset":28,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dg0v9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"5435AD90E9F711EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9p7aj","text":"Aliquot cells for analysis or experimentation, and then freeze down cells in up to 3 x 107 aliquots using Cryostor CS10 Medium, a Mr. Frosty, and a   freezer ( -  aliquots, round down to the nearest 20 million cells and discard/freeze/use any left over cells). Record the number of vials frozen: __________.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":89,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":148,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":159,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":161,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6k1pl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"59C37DF0E9F711EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"5FE63B50E9F711EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1.5","error":false,"guid":"6200DDF0E9F711EBA58977BD67052113","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
